text: @realDonaldTrump Come November 3, 2020, we will see if its enough of them to vote for you to keep you in office. I predict your lack of leadership, a ballooning deficit, a rising COVID19 death toll, and civil unrest will cost you the White House and sweep the GOP out of control.
